entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
